mapper.sql: id, user_name, in_txt_url, in_png_url, out_txt_url, out_png_url, upload_time, transform_time, txt_file_name, png_file_name, prj_name,seismic,structure,scale
mapper.insert:
insert into wall_transform_info
user_name,
in_txt_url,
in_png_url,
out_txt_url,
out_png_url,
upload_time,
transform_time,
txt_file_name,
png_file_name,
prj_name,
seismic,
structure,
scale,
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update: update wall_transform_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_txt_url = #{inTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_png_url = #{inPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_txt_url = #{outTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_png_url = #{outPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, transform_time = #{transformTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, txt_file_name = #{txtFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, png_file_name = #{pngFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prj_name = #{prjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `scale` = #{scale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, structure = #{structure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seismic = #{seismic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id,user_name,in_txt_url,in_png_url,out_txt_url,out_png_url,upload_time,prj_name,txt_file_name,png_file_name,`scale`,seismic,structure FROM wall_transform_info WHERE user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT txt_file_name,png_file_name from wall_transform_info where user_name = #{username} and id = #{id}
